skillTree.name: Terradon
skillTree.description: Dangerous predators with sharp talons and pointed beaks, these giant flying reptiles are surprisingly agile and can spot their prey at great distances.

skillTree.name: Stegadon
skillTree.description: Mighty, horned, reptilian beasts, Stegadons are naturally armoured with bony scales and spikes protruding from their crests.

skillTree.name: Ancient Stegadon
skillTree.description: Amongst the largest and most ferocious of their race, the eldest Stegadons have thicker hide and larger horns than others of their kind.

skillTree.name: Guerrilla Fighter
skillTree.description: Whereby the terrain itself is both shield and weapon, enabling the Lizardmen to both mask their numbers and surprise the foe.

skillTree.name: Natural Camouflage
skillTree.description: Some Lizardmen are able to seamlessly blend in with their jungle environment in order to observe, or defend themselves from, their enemies.

skillTree.name: Agility of the Lizard
skillTree.description: Lizardmen can move with deceptive speed and agility when they have to.

skillTree.name: Protection of the Old Ones
skillTree.description: Across the gulf of space, the serene Potec has shared the secrets of time so that the Lizardmen may protect themselves against supernatural attack.

skillTree.name: Immortality
skillTree.description: Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say noâ€¦

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

skillTree.name: Perceptive
skillTree.description: It is the duty of a Skink Chief not only to obey, but also to notice and adapt.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +5% chance of wounding aggressors

skillTree.name: Efficient Management
skillTree.description: The Skink Chief keeps the supply lines running and sees the will of the priests done.

skillTree.name: Hardy Spawning
skillTree.description: Some spawning are stronger and more resilient than others.

skillTree.name: Master Scout
skillTree.description: Coordinating with a team of Skinks, the Chief keeps eyes on the entire province.

skillTree.name: Impressive Crest
skillTree.description: Some are marked by the Old Ones for greatness.

skillTree.name: Construction Overseer
skillTree.description: The Slann pass their enigmatic orders to the priests, who then turn to the chiefs. The chiefs get the job done.

skillTree.name: Dance of Death
skillTree.description: So much of war is an art. Over time and with much practice, combat moves can resemble a series of perfectly-rehearsed dance moves.

skillTree.name: Gutter Fighter
skillTree.description: This being fights dirty, no honour system applies here!

skillTree.name: Piercing Shots
skillTree.description: The forest teaches a warrior not only when to fire but where, which makes a bigger difference.

skillTree.name: Precise
skillTree.description: Whether a targeted slice to the throat, or a precision stab to the heart, this one knows how to kill!

skillTree.name: Survivalist
skillTree.description: "The enemy's fear; their blood spilt in the mud - these are the things that sustain me."

skillTree.name: Jungle Toxins
skillTree.description: The jungle flora harbours the Lizardmen's microscopic allies in the war that never ends.

skillTree.name: Fleet-Footed
skillTree.description: Those who are fleet of foot can reach the enemy faster.

skillTree.name: Opportunist
skillTree.description: Always on the lookout for an opening or advantage in battle - somewhere to put the knife inâ€¦

skillTree.name: Bottomless Quiver
skillTree.description: Always willing to fight on, a widened quiver allows arrows to rain, almost without end.

skillTree.name: Bloody Blade
skillTree.description: A drawn blade should not be put away until slaked in blood.

skillTree.name: Huanchi's Blessing
skillTree.description: The Jaguar God grants agility and speed.

skillTree.name: Imposing Stature
skillTree.description: Large, for a Skink.

effects.description: Melee defence: +1 for Skink, Chameleon Skink, Chameleon Stalker and Red Crested Skink units
Melee defence: +2 for Skink, Chameleon Skink, Chameleon Stalker and Red Crested Skink units
Melee defence: +3 for Skink, Chameleon Skink, Chameleon Stalker and Red Crested Skink units

skillTree.name: Energetic
skillTree.description: Fast, for a lizard.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +2% for Skink, Chameleon Skink, Chameleon Stalker and Red Crested Skink units
Missile strength: +2% for Skink, Chameleon Skink and Chameleon Stalker units
Weapon strength: +4% for Skink, Chameleon Skink, Chameleon Stalker and Red Crested Skink units
Missile strength: +4% for Skink, Chameleon Skink and Chameleon Stalker units
Weapon strength: +6% for Skink, Chameleon Skink, Chameleon Stalker and Red Crested Skink units
Missile strength: +6% for Skink, Chameleon Skink and Chameleon Stalker units

skillTree.name: Resilient
skillTree.description: Able to take a hit or two without giving ground.

effects.description: Missile resistance: 2% for Skink, Chameleon Skink and Red Crested Skink units
Missile resistance: 4% for Skink, Chameleon Skink and Red Crested Skink units
Missile resistance: 6% for Skink, Chameleon Skink and Red Crested Skink units

skillTree.name: Marked for Service
skillTree.description: It is not a Skink Chief's duty to fall in battle, but to live and direct the warriors in all battles.

effects.description: Leadership: +1 for Skink, Chameleon Skink and Red Crested Skink units
Leadership: +2 for Skink, Chameleon Skink and Red Crested Skink units
Leadership: +3 for Skink, Chameleon Skink and Red Crested Skink units

skillTree.name: Swift Communication
skillTree.description: Capable of giving out orders and adapting to any situation.

skillTree.name: Hidden Paths
skillTree.description: There is always another way.

skillTree.name: Retinue: Disciple
skillTree.description: Useful, if a bit impetuous.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +1% chance of wounding aggressors
Hero self-defence: +3% chance of wounding aggressors
Hero self-defence: +6% chance of wounding aggressors

skillTree.name: Notorious
skillTree.description: Itâ€™s difficult to sleep with one eye open and a dagger under your pillow.

skillTree.name: Contacts
skillTree.description: Sometimes itâ€™s best to have friends in low places.

skillTree.name: Shadow
skillTree.description: Always watching.

skillTree.name: Grandmaster
skillTree.description: Theyâ€™ve all heard the stories of this oneâ€™s accomplishments. The stories, of course, pale in comparison to the truth.

skillTree.name: {{tr:agent_action_name_replenish_troops}}
skillTree.description: Those in the army can find succour or be replenished by the power of this champion.

effects.description: Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 3%
Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 7%
Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 12%

skillTree.name: {{tr:agent_action_name_boost_income}}
skillTree.description: Such magic-users may be wise and able to offer sage advice, especially if they have scried the region.

effects.description: Boost Income action: Income is modified by an additional 2%
Boost Income action: Income is modified by an additional 4%
Boost Income action: Income is modified by an additional 6%

skillTree.name: {{tr:agent_action_name_damage_walls}}
skillTree.description: They cannot stop what they cannot see.

effects.description: Damage Walls action: 1 additional wall breaches
Damage Walls action: 2 additional wall breaches
Damage Walls action: 3 additional wall breaches

skillTree.name: {{tr:agent_action_name_assassinate}}
skillTree.description: A skilled assassin is a cold-hearted killer and merciless murderer.

skillTree.name: {{tr:agent_action_name_hinder_replenishment}}
skillTree.description: The sight of a powerful figure extolling death and blasphemies can bring enemy ranks to their knees.

effects.description: Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -10%
Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -20%
Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -40%

skillTree.name: Specialist
skillTree.description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

skillTree.name: Maintenance
skillTree.description: FACTIONWIDE: all source of income: -0,5% and characters upkeep: +1%. Effects are additive. Negated on level 30 of character.

skillTree.name: Arrogant
skillTree.description: Self-important and opinionated, this one's hubris knows no end.

skillTree.name: Humble
skillTree.description: Self-effacing and unpresuming, he believes that we all have a part to play in the Great Plan, one way or another.

skillTree.name: Pompous
skillTree.description: "What are you even for? You're not part of the Great Plan, like all your kind."

skillTree.name: Uncompromising
skillTree.description: "The Plan is the Plan. We shall not deviate or retreat from its path."

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +25% chance of wounding aggressors

skillTree.name: Fleet-Footed
skillTree.description: Being fleet of foot is useful in a fightâ€¦ or when trying to get away afterwards!

skillTree.name: Cunning
skillTree.description: Deceit is a perfectly acceptable means of attack.

skillTree.name: Determined
skillTree.description: Having a modicum of resolve is useful in a world that continually tests it.

skillTree.name: Confident
skillTree.description: Self-belief is a fine thing when not misplaced.

skillTree.name: Disciplined
skillTree.description: Always in control, this one leaves no stone unturned and nothing to chance.

skillTree.name: Perceptive
skillTree.description: Although actually reading minds is not in their skillset, this one has extraordinary insight into the motives of others.

skillTree.name: Aggressive
skillTree.description: If you're gonna die, you may as well die with your boots on.

skillTree.name: Tough
skillTree.description: Rugged, resistant, and almost unbreakable, this being can and will take on all comers.

skillTree.name: Strong
skillTree.description: Well built, robust. Powerful.

skillTree.name: Weapon Master
skillTree.description: If you can swing, slash, stab, gouge, or shoot it, this warrior has mastered every aspect of its use.

skillTree.name: Strategist
skillTree.description: This being has a plan - not just a game plan, but a master plan to achieve their long-term aims.

skillTree.name: Tactician
skillTree.description: Careful planning, knowledge of the terrain and the weaknesses of the enemy are the key to victory.

skillTree.name: Vigorous
skillTree.description: A skink that never gets tired or hungy.

skillTree.name: Kroxigor Leader
skillTree.description: The Lizardmen follow him and respect him.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +5% for Kroxigor and Sacred Kroxigor units
Armour: +5 for Kroxigor and Sacred Kroxigor units
Charge bonus: +5 for Kroxigor and Sacred Kroxigor units

skillTree.name: Skink Master
skillTree.description: Leader of many skink generations.

effects.description: Upkeep: -5% for Skink and Chameleon Skinks units
Speed: +10% for Skink, Chameleon Skink, Chameleon Stalker and Red Crested Skink units
Recruit rank: +1 for Skink and Chameleon Skinks units

skillTree.name: Sky Rider
skillTree.description: To the skies!

effects.description: Speed: +10% for Terradon Riders, Ripperdactyl Riders, Coatl and Cold One units
Weapon strength: +5% for Terradon Riders, Ripperdactyl Riders and Coatl units
Missile strength: +5% for Terradon Riders units

skillTree.name: Survivor
skillTree.description: Survivor and shepard of his kind.
